about.summary: Library and multi-object file format for storing and managing data between machines.

name: hdf4
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "4.2.12" %}

package:
    name: hdf4
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: hdf-{{ version }}.tar.bz2
    url: http://www.hdfgroup.org/ftp/HDF/HDF_Current/src/hdf-{{ version }}.tar.bz2
    sha256: 2d224a57a711d853d71b92ef0875d295b410454b005144ebd3dd4b3d4c811208
    patches:
        - max_files.patch

build:
    number: 0
    features:
        - vc9  # [win and py27]
        - vc10  # [win and py34]
        - vc14  # [win and py35]

requirements:
    build:
        - python  # [win]
        - cmake  # [win]
        - msinttypes  # [win and py<35]
        - bison  # [unix]
        - flex  # [unix]
        - zlib 1.2.*
        - jpeg 9*
    run:
        - zlib 1.2.*
        - jpeg 9*

test:
    commands:
        - hdiff -V  # [unix]
        - h4_ncgen -V  # [unix]
        - h4_ncdump -V  # [unix]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libdf.a  # [unix]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libmfhdf.a  # [unix]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libdf.so  # [linux]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libdf.dylib  # [osx]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libmfhdf.so  # [linux]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libmfhdf.dylib  # [osx]
        - conda inspect linkages -n _test hdf4  # [not win]
        - conda inspect objects -n _test hdf4  # [osx]

about:
    home: http://www.hdfgroup.org/HDF4/
    license: BSD 3-Clause
    summary: 'Library and multi-object file format for storing and managing data between machines.'
    license_family: BSD
    license_file: COPYING

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - groutr
        - msarahan
        - ocefpaf
